channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Datadog Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Datadog Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-37944|2024-08-02T17:23:27.780Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20datadog%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Datadog Plugin 5.4.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
